text:
OS: Win2k3 Ent. Srv.

No matter where and how I put IndexIgnore, it simply wont show any effects when 
gnerating the index page.

IndexIgnore m3u .m3u

I tried putting in global & dir specific way, but no luck.

However,

IndexOptions NameWidth=*

does work. So, aparently mod_autoindex is only partially not functioning.

This is not a bug with mod_autoindex but rather a bug in the documentation.

mod_autoindex uses ap_str(case)cmp_match which expects a shell-style wildcard expression (or a 
full filename), in your case something like 'IndexIgnore *.m3u' and *not* partial filenames or 
extensions as stated in the documentation.
